description.description: Description and identifier for combined service pricing, e.g. hotel price includes flight fare (alphabetical order): HOTEL|JOURNEY, CAR|HOTEL|JOURNEY, JOURNEY, etc.

price.description: Price for the reservation or ticket

totalPrice.description: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc.

currency.description: The currency (in 3-letter ISO 4217 format) of the price.

priceMarketId.description: A unique identifier for price market combining ISO codes for currency and country

isSoldOut.description: Whether fare is sold out - if isSoldOut=true, fare = NULL
